name: Skully and the Candy Corn
description:
Story:

Skully just wanted to go trick-or-treating on Halloween, but something went wrong...

Gameplay:

  • 3 levels
  • Timer function
  • Fun platformer gameplay

Trick or Treat Jam:

I decided to also "use" the Candy Corn modifier and used just a Candy Corn color pallete. All graphics are 16x16 and done by myself. Also the music is based and inspired on a midi file (https://bitmidi.com/hungarian-dance-no-5-mid) and finally mixed and done by myself in Garage Band, It is Brahms Hungarian Dance No. 5.

It is best played with a gamepad but can also be played with a keyboard.

Gamepad:

Left Stick to move around, A to jump. D-pad in the main menu. Select/Share to restart.

Keyboard:

Arrow keys to move around. Space to jump. R to restart.

The executables are the best experience. The webplayer could cause troubles with keyboard and gamepad.
